abstrac: Available for transcription or data entry
bio:
I have over 19 years of administrative experience, including extensive knowledge of word processing, data entry, and general typing. I am also very computer savvy.  My current typing speed is 75 WPM.  I am also familiar with transcription programs such as Express Scribe, Total Recorder, etc.  I have a USB Infiniti Foot Pedal, USB headset and I use MS Word 2002.  I also have  very quick DSL internet connection.  I receive most of my files through an FTP server, so I am familiar with that process.  I am a very quick learner and know that my desire to learn along with my skills make me a great transcriptionist.  

I have been transcribing for six years on a steady and regular basis.  I have seen my speed, accuracy, and knowledge increase tremendously.  I can transcribe a one-hour file in about 4 hours.  I have received very high marks from the four companies I have been working with.  The types of projects that I have been transcribing have been general letters, legal letters, insurance,
Please contact me via email. I check it several times a day and will get back to you as quickly as possible.

bio:
Our objective is to engage and provide expertise as a business development,sales and marketing consultant. My name is Jerry and I have 25 years of experience as a sales management professional. I am highly skilled as a sales coach and excel in the following area's.
- Cold calling
- B2B sales
- Customer service
- Strong closing skills
- Customer service 
- Strategic sales planning
We are seeking companies that are looking to cut costs and privatize their sales management team. We can plan and teach a regimented sales structure for your sales staff. We can also follow up and hold them accountable. Think of it this way we can be your sales management team on retainer without all the extra expense. We can also act as your sales team. 

Please write to me at jmaenterprisesllc@yahoo.com if you have any questions.

I look forward to hearing from you.
Payment method- Safepay Escrow or PayPal   Communication- Email, telephone, remote access      I can be reached between 6:00am-11:00pm EST.

bio:
Client work examples:   http://www.mydisruption.com/#4Client love letters:   http://www.mydisruption.com/#2Unconventional Marketing Blog:  http://mydisruption.wordpress.com/Fun Stuff:  http://www.disruptivedave.com
Unconventional marketer who focuses on using creativity and elbow grease over big budgets and wide cast nets. I specialize in analyzing and enhancing the overall customer experience so that your brand thrives on positive word of mouth.

My first step is always to meet with the client (phone, in person, Skype, whatever works for you) to understand your background, goals and needs. Everything I do is based on focused strategy, so I can't react precisely without proper background information. From that point, I like to share my plan, explain my strategy, and ensure we are all on the same page before moving forward with estimated costs and terms. I don't nickel and dime and have never been a clock watcher. I'm a veteran in the client services industry, so I understand how important access, feedback and consistent status updates are to you.
